polyline.style: fill: none; stroke: #0a0a0a; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2;

rect.style: fill: none; stroke: #0a0a0a; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2;

line.style: fill: none; stroke: #fed036; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2;

path.style: fill: none; stroke: #fed036; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2;
